title: Edit Blocks — editing
text: functions assigned blocks inside plan_sec(b* = fun(...)). See planning. e div edit existing blocks, rest adds new markdown content. e used single element blocks ('text expressions'). splits expression clauses, allows user select alter . div used multi-element blocks. Currently, returns block . add_cur_head adds heading current section, specified level.

title: Plan Document Morphing — planning
text: sections list sections returned split_sections. level_add integer value adjust header level sections. instance, level_add = 1 transform "# Header" "## Header". Negative values decrease header value. ... s* = plan_sec(...) arguments plan_doc, b* = fun(...) arguments plan_sec. head_level integer value set heading level current section header.
